Texts.Chs: 把^orange;奇迹草种子^reset;带给这名科学家。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Miracle Grass^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我迫切需要3个^green;奇迹草种子^reset;来做一个全新的再生试验。你可以在^orange;植物合成器^reset;制作，能给我一些吗？
Texts.Eng: I am in need of 3 ^orange;Miracle Grass^reset; seeds to try a new regeneration experiment. You'll find them at your ^orange;Gene Design Lab^reset;. Can you fetch me some?

Texts.Chs: 谢谢，现在我可以继续进行我研究了，等着让投资人为我惊呼吧！之后^green;我会送给你备用种子^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Thanks, now I can complete this research project and wow the investors! ^green;I'll send replacement seeds^reset; later.
